_sText:
Grua is spanish for crane.

This is a Gungame 4hm level. I made it small for close contact fighting (a quick game is a good game). I added a few camping and sniper spots for fair gameplay.

Caution, you cannot go for a swim in my version of Sydney harbour, the water is deadly ;). 

There is access onto the Tub Boats for all u campers but u can't hide on it. Be carefull not to fall into the water when you try to board them.

I made some custom textures of the Sydney skyline and added harbour soundscape for atmosphere.

Enjoy

MadNoob
